title: Outcome Tracking on Entries
description: After analysis, let user mark resolution quality later. Options: 'Resolved well', 'Got worse', 'Still ongoing'. Feeds into 'Similar moments' to show what worked. Creates learning loop for MIRA.

title: Build journal entry UI with voice input
description: Create main journal entry form with textarea, voice recording, and conversation paste. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/04-journal-entry-ui.md

title: Implement MIRA user ID mapping
description: Create mapping between Firebase UIDs and MIRA user IDs. Store in Firestore collection.

title: Connect Stripe billing
description: Connect Stripe billing for Mora Plus/Pro. Implement checkout + billing portal + webhook to set users/{uid}.isPro and subscriptionTier. Tie upgrades to quota gating and premium outputs (best draft / deeper recall).

title: Free Tier Memory Limits + Upgrade Prompts
description: Implement: Free = 10 memories max (oldest decay), 1 playbook, 30 day max age. Pro = unlimited. Show upgrade prompts when hitting limits: 'You have 10 memories. Oldest will fade unless you upgrade.' Loss aversion drives conversion.

title: Create thread list and detail views
description: Build UI for auto-generated topic threads (replaces old People view)

title: Pattern Detail with Personal History
description: Enhance PatternCard. Show general pattern info (from COMMON_PATTERNS) + 'Your history with this pattern' section. Track detections per person, outcomes, effectiveness. 'I have moved past this' / 'Still working on it' actions. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 6.

title: Deploy MIRA-OSS service to Cloud Run
description:
Deploy MIRA-OSS as sidecar service on Cloud Run with PostgreSQL and Valkey.

DECISION (2026-01-10): Confirmed Option 1 - Sidecar Architecture. MIRA runs as separate Cloud Run service, Firebase Functions call it via bridge. Accepted risk of maintaining OSS fork. Self-hosting for data control.

See docs/implementation/01-foundation/01-mira-deployment.md and docs/decisions/001-mira-oss-integration.md for details.

title: Journal Entry: Memory Surfacing Box
description: The magic moment. As user types (500ms debounce), surface relevant memories from MIRA. Show: 'From your history with [person]' box with 1-3 memories + pattern alert if active. Graceful degradation if MIRA unavailable. Cold start: 'Mora will remember this for next time'. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 2.

title: Relationship Playbooks (Domaindocs)
description: Per-person playbooks with collapsible sections: What triggers them, What triggers me, What works, What makes it worse, Key moments. Maps to MIRA domaindocs. User can edit. AI suggests additions from analysis. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 4.

title: Memory Browser
description: Let users see all their memories. Filter by person/context/pattern. Show importance score. Actions: Edit, Delete, 'This is wrong' (feeds back to MIRA for correction). Builds trust in the AI. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 5.

title: Build Firebase-MIRA bridge function
description: Create analyzeEntry Cloud Function that bridges Firebase to MIRA-OSS. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/02-firebase-mira-bridge.md for implementation details.

title: Persist pattern bookmarks to Firestore
description: When users tap 'This applies to me' on a pattern, persist to user preferences in Firestore. These become seed data for MIRA personalization. Currently just logs to console.

title: Analysis: Similar Moments from History
description: Show 'Similar moments from your history' on analysis result. List 2-3 past entries with same person/pattern + their outcomes (Resolution: Good/Painful). Link to full history. 'The holy shit moment' - proves AI remembers. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 3.

title: Home Screen: Your Story So Far
description: Replace People list with memory-centric home. Show: memory count + age, per-person latest insight, pattern alerts, relationship health (calm/active), recent entries list. Two CTAs: Write journal / Paste conversation. See docs/design/UX-MEMORY-FIRST.md Section 1.

title: Memory v0 UI: visible recall + correction
description: Add a visible 'Mora remembered' section on the analysis result screen. Show 3-7 recalled memories with short snippet + 'why this matters'. Add actions: Not relevant (hide + downrank) and Wrong (capture short correction). Must degrade gracefully if no memory. Depends on MIRA bridge (mora-r5o).
